about_the_game:
This DLC adds 3 additional background tracks for the player to enjoy.
The player gets to choose which songs are to be played, so he gets a fully customizable music experience.

The following tracks are included:

  • Soft Japanese Ambience
  • South East Asia
  • Jazz Piano
detailed_description:

name: All You Can Feed: Sushi Bar - Music DLC 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 Support
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8500 GT or Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
